raw_comment:
Notice: In the southern parts of the U.S.A. the first leaves come first, because it is closest to the equator and leaves need warmth to grow.
Wonder: What months do Alaska and Hawaii bloom their first leaves in.
My catchy title would be Heaps of leaves
ace_sentences: The southern parts of the U.S.A. are closer to the equator than other parts of the U.S.A..
In the southern parts of the U.S.A., the first leaves come first.
Because the southern parts of the U.S.A. are close to the equator, the southern parts of the U.S.A. are warm.
I wonder in which months Alaska blooms its first leaves.
I wonder in which months Hawaii blooms its first leaves.
My catchy title is "Heaps of leaves".
